page.title: 17SHARON'S SUNDAY
page.content: It's Sunday morning and I get up at 6.5 0.I climb out of my bunk-bed and dress in warm clothes against the early morn- ing chill.For breakfast I have Weetabix and a cup of coffee.Next I go to the paper shop to collect the papers and deliver them.I go home afterwards and watch TVAM or play on my computer until Mum and Dad get up at about 9.30,then well do the housework.Mum or Dad then get the dinner ready.We usually have meat,vegetables,potatoes and gravy.We may go to the club for a drink and then return home for our meal.My sister and I do the washing-up.In the afternoon we rest and sometimes do the gardening dep ending on the weather.At about 6.30 we have our tea of salad or sandwiches. Then after 7.00 I have a bath ready for school,and the rest of the family have their baths.By this time we are all settled in front of the TV till bedtime
